entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -21.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -26.3°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
